text: Adso may refer to: * Adso of Montier-en-Der (920–992), abbot of the Benedictine monastery of Montier-en-Der Abbey in France * Adso of Melk, a character in The Name of the Rose * ADSO (Application Development System Online), a tool used to expedite the writing and testing of modular applications using IDMS databases
title: Adso
